# BodyTrackingComponent.Target.body(identifier:)

**Case**

A person detected by ARKit.

## Declaration

```swift
case body(identifier: UUID)
```

## Body tracking target types

- **BodyTrackingComponent.Target.any**: Any person that is detected in front of the camera.
